module.name: oddjob
module.summary: Oddjob provides a mechanism by which unprivileged applications can request that specified privileged operations be performed on their behalf.

interface.name: oddjob_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute a domain transition to run oddjob.

interface.name: oddjob_system_entry
interface.summary: Make the specified program domain accessable from the oddjob.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process to transition to.

param.name: entrypoint
param.summary: The type of the file used as an entrypoint to this domain.

interface.name: oddjob_dbus_chat
interface.summary: Send and receive messages from oddjob over dbus.

interface.name: oddjob_domtrans_mkhomedir
interface.summary: Execute a domain transition to run oddjob_mkhomedir.
